name: HataMischiefHouse
description:
Secrets,be careful of Traps,searching the area with curiosity.

Move and touch finish flag.

Control(KeyBoard,you can edit in Options):

Z to Jump

C to Dash

Control(XBox Controller):

Left Stick to Moves

A Button to Jump

Right Trigger to Dash
